channel.title: Banning
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I'm wondering if there's a way to disable ::ipban theif and any other ban commands towards me.
Also is there a way to clear all the ban logs by command?
All help is appreciated
Thanx! :)

item.title: Banning
item.dc:creator: @b1g_th13f b1g th13f
item.description:
@b1g_th13f wrote:

[code]if(command.startsWith(“ipban”) && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“akanaz”) {
String victim = command.substring(8);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Admin:”+playerName+" is banning "+victim;
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully banned”);
appendToBanned(victim);
BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("C:/Documents and Settings/Jordan.pimp/My Documents/my server stuff/adminpk/banlogs.txt", true));
 bw.write(playerName+" banned"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging bans!");
 }
  }

}[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Banning
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

Hmm, 2 errors:

[code]client.java:4100: cannot find symbol
symbol : class File
location = class client
File file = new File("./data/bannedusers.txt");
^

client.java:4100: cannot find symbol
symbol : class File
location = class client
File file = new File("./data/bannedusers.txt");
^ [/code]

I know i should know my errors but still

I will rep you all the same for the command alothough further assistance would be appreciated.

Thanx

item.title: Banning
item.dc:creator: @Jpspkz Jpspkz
item.description:
@Jpspkz wrote:

Dodian? xD heres mine: take a look at it. [code] else if (command.startsWith(“unban”) && playerRights >= 2) { // made by Jp
File file = new File("./data/bannedusers.txt");

        if (file.exists()) {
            String victim = command.substring(5);

            sendMessage("Player " + victim + " successfully unbanned"); // made by Jp	
            try {
                BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(file));
                BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(file));
                String unban = command.substring(6);
                String inFile;

                while ((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) {
                    if (inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unban)) {// Leave this blank we dont want it to write a file.
                    } else {
                        out.write(inFile); // made by Jp
                    }

                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
            }
        } else {
            System.out.println("Error unbanning user"); 	
        }
    }

[/code]
